NOTICE_DATA.ORIGINAL_CPV: Other community, social and personal services

TI_TEXT.P: Servicii de învăţământ şi formare profesională

SHORT_DESCR.P: Nottinghamshire County Council (the Council) sought organisations who are able to provide high quality Community Learning to adults over the age of 19 in Nottinghamshire.
Suppliers who are on the DPS Community Learning List A or B were invited to tender for contracts for the following Community Learning provision:
— LLDD (Learners with Learning Difficulties and/or Disabilities).
Employability — For bidders whose company turnover is less than GBP 100 000 per annum.
Health and Wellbeing — For bidders whose company turnover is less than GBP 100 000 per annum.
Family Learning — For bidders whose company turnover is less than GBP 100 000 per annum.
LLDD Employability — For bidders whose company turnover is less than GBP 100 000 per annum.
